author: @wagmnews
title: Madawaska's Main Street Gains New Life
text:
By Valter Wiklund Published: Dec. 26, 2024 at 4:43 PM EST | Updated: 6 hours ago Email This Link
Share on Facebook
Share on X (formerly Twitter)
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
PRESQUE ISLE, Maine (WAGM) - A Main street building in Madawaska has changed hands. Valter Wiklund of our student partner at WOWL in Madawaska has the story.
Earlier this year a Madawaska business decided to purchase the old Frasier Credit Union building on main street. Crown Lakes Realty owner Matt Dechaine took a moment to discuss his purchase.
‚ÄúSo in the state of Maine if you want to run your own brokerage which is your own real estate agency, then you have to have your own office to do it. So last year we started out by renting an office but we always wanted to own our own so that we could develop it and you know try to have rental income beyond just our office so we had seen this building for sale, we actually had it listed ourselves and we got to the point where it seemed to fit our needs and we had the budget to renovate so we bought it earlier this year and you know it‚Äôs been great since.‚Äù
He also discussed his future plans.
‚ÄúSo we‚Äôve been fixing it up just to kind of one, look good enough for our business. It was empty for you know ten years before we bought it so there was a lot of dusting, cleaning, just getting the furnace going was a big job. But now that we‚Äôre getting settled in, we are trying to see who else might have some office needs. When we were looking for an office, we had a hard time finding a nice space for rent so I figured there‚Äôs gotta be that need for other people. So as we find people that want you know whether it‚Äôs an accountant, someone who works from home, a massage therapist, if they need a space we‚Äôll show them what we got and you know one by one we‚Äôll start getting the different offices filled up.‚Äù
What are some of the community benefits with buying this building?
‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs a benefit for a couple of reasons. One is as you notice on main street there‚Äôs some buildings that are unoccupied, you know people aren‚Äôt in there, the front doesn‚Äôt look great, but its slowly been coming back so I‚Äôm really happy to be part of that sort of resurgence of main street in Madawaska. We got a coffee shop across the street, Bry‚Äôs Quick Stop has come back as Habib‚Äôs now, this building is coming back. So I think that‚Äôs great and then as for the extra space we‚Äôre providing, you know there‚Äôs a need for good office space and single practitioner space so the fact that we can provide what we needed a year ago you know, hopefully helps other people move into their own business.‚Äù
For WOWL, this is Valter Wiklund
Copyright 2024 WAGM. All rights reserved.

author: @postkhmer
title: ‚ÄãNew minimum wage in effect, up $4 per month | Phnom Penh Post
text: With the arrival of a new calendar year, workers in textile, garment, footwear, and travel goods factories are set to enjoy a new minimum monthly salary of $204. The new figure is $4 higher than the 2023 wage. The increase in minimum wage for 2024 was announced in November last year, following 20 consultative meetings between stakeholders. Prime Minister Hun Manet took to social media on January 2 to offer his best wishes to the workers. ‚ÄúFrom January 2024, workers ‚Ä¶ will receive a monthly salary of $204 ‚Äì a $4 increase from December,‚Äù he said briefly. On November 28, the Ministry of Labour and Vocational Training issued a statement from the National Council on Minimum Wage (NCMW), announcing that the NCMW had set a monthly salary of $202 for factory workers in these sectors. The prime minister announced a $2 increase to the figure. ‚ÄúI have decided to add $2 to the $202 minimum wage which was the result of the NCMW vote. Therefore, the 2024 minimum wage will be $204 per month, an increase of $4 over 2023,‚Äù Manet said at the time. Chan Than, an employee of Bayon Garment Factory in Boeung Kak I commune, in Phnom Penh‚Äôs Russey Keo district, said on January 2 that even though the $4 increase was not as much as she had expected, it was ‚Äúbetter than nothing‚Äù. She claimed that most workers were worried about layoffs almost every day, and were not working as much overtime as they used to. ‚ÄúEvery day my factory offers less overtime. I keep worrying about layoffs. To be honest, I am less concerned about whether we get an increase or not. What is important is that I can work overtime to earn more money,‚Äù she said. Chorn Piseth, another worker from the factory, explained that he worked in the carton section and worked overtime every chance he got, even on Sundays and national holidays. Including the new salary increase, he could now earn from $350 to $400 per month. ‚ÄúMy department has a lot of work because we don‚Äôt have many workers. This means there is often overtime available. When I get paid, I can afford to provide for my day-to-day expenses,‚Äù he said. Ath Thorn, president of the Cambodian Labour Confederation (CLC) and member of the NCMW, called on all factories and employers to apply the new figure. He noted that the monthly wage of $204 applies to experienced workers, while new employees earn $202. ‚ÄúFrom January 2024, the new minimum wage must be applied to all workers. We appeal to all employers to apply it fully and equally, no matter how big or small their factories are. ‚ÄúIn addition, I believe that companies should consider adding another $4 to the $204 wage for skilled workers, so they can earn a decent living,‚Äù he said. According to the labour ministry, the average factory worker will now earn from $221 to $232 per month, thanks to additional benefits. In addition, the government and relevant institutions are seeking to reduce the cost of living of workers throughout the country.

author: @Las2orillas
title: La nueva tienda para comprar maquillaje en Bogot√°, muy barato y queda en zona exclusiva
text: En Bogot√° existen muchos lugares en los que se pueden conseguir productos de calidad a precios bajos, uno de los m√°s reconocidos es el Centro de la ciudad, espec√≠ficamente en San Victorino. All√≠ se pueden encontrar todo tipo de art√≠culos desde ropa hasta juguetes. Sin embargo, recientemente en redes sociales algunas creadoras de contenido han mostrado la nueva tienda para comparar maquillaje en Bogot√° que se encuentra en el norte de la capital. En la Zona T, en el norte de la capital del pa√≠s, sobre la calle 85, se encuentra una tienda donde las personas podr√°n conseguir art√≠culos de belleza, cuidado de la piel y capilar, adem√°s de algunos productos de paler√≠a e incluso dulces, desde los $2.000. author: Thomas Lester
title: Kimbrell's to close High Point store after two years
text: Charlotte-based Kimbrell‚Äôs Home Furnishings is closing its High Point store at the Palladium shopping center after opening in early 2023. Store closing signs are up as the company liquidates inventory and lists the property for sale. Other Kimbrell‚Äôs locations remain open.

author: redacao@odia.com.br (O Dia)
title: Ano novo, novas perspectivas de emprego
text:
Brasil deve seguir criando empregos no ano que vem, ainda que em um ritmo menos aceleradoMarcello Casal Jr./Ag√™ncia Brasil
"O n√≠vel de emprego deve continuar aumentando, na medida em que se espera que a economia cres√ßa em 2024. Mas o ritmo de crescimento do emprego deve se reduzir muito, e j√° desacelerou bastante nos √∫ltimos meses", destaca o economista Francisco Eduardo Pires de Souza, especialista em economia monet√°ria e desenvolvimento econ√¥mico da Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ). "Mas a taxa de desemprego j√° se reduziu substancialmente, sugerindo que que o ritmo de crescimento da ocupa√ß√£o ter√° que ser bem menor daqui para a frente", completa.
Enquanto e, 2023 o Produto Interno Bruto (PIB) do Brasil deve crescer cerca de 3,0%, as estimativas para o pr√≥ximo ano est√£o em torno de 1,5%. A desacelera√ß√£o da economia deve provocar uma redu√ß√£o da taxa b√°sica de juros Selic dos atuais 11,75% ao ano para 9% no fim de 2024, segundo a mais recente pesquisa Focus do Banco Central.
Na avalia√ß√£o do economista Rodolpho Tobler, do FGV Ibre, a taxa de desemprego deve andar mais ‚Äúde lado‚Äù no pr√≥ximo ano. "O principal motor da recupera√ß√£o no mercado de trabalho √© a atividade econ√¥mica, especialmente neste per√≠odo que j√° podemos chamar de p√≥s-pandemia. Para 2024, podemos esperar uma certa desacelera√ß√£o na atividade. Isso ocorre em grande parte devido ao processo de redu√ß√£o de juros. Esse n√£o √© um processo t√£o r√°pido. Ainda estamos em um patamar muito alto de juros na economia. Portanto, a expectativa √© que no pr√≥ximo ano a economia tamb√©m n√£o esteja em um ritmo t√£o forte, refletindo-se no mercado de trabalho."
No trimestre encerrado em novembro a taxa de desemprego no pa√≠s recuou para 7,5%, o que representa o menor n√≠vel desde 2014, de acordo com dados do Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estat√≠stica (IBGE). No acumulado do ano at√© novembro, foram gerados no pa√≠s 1.914.467 postos de trabalho no pa√≠s, segundo os √∫ltimos dados do Cadastro Geral de Empregados e Desempregados (Caged).
O professor Francisco Eduardo Pires de Souza destacou que o setor de servi√ßos, que historicamente representa uma parcela significativa dos empregos no pa√≠s, continuou sendo o grande respons√°vel pelo crescimento do emprego em 2023. No entanto, a constru√ß√£o civil, tradicionalmente um setor robusto em termos de emprego, vem desacelerando neste ano. Segundo ele, o PAC e o programa Minha Casa Minha Vida podem contribuir para o emprego neste setor, mas a dimens√£o exata desses programas em 2024 ainda n√£o est√° clara.
Tend√™ncias e dicas e para buscar emprego em 2024
Para a diretora de gest√£o estrat√©gica de pessoas do ManpowerGroup, Wilma Dal Col, o mercado est√° vivenciando uma transforma√ß√£o nos processos de trabalho, nas fun√ß√µes e na forma como as entregas profissionais s√£o demandadas. Dessa forma, o que era uma tend√™ncia torna-se uma realidade: uma demanda por maior flexibiliza√ß√£o por parte do empregador.
‚ÄúOs candidatos devem demonstrar, por meio de evid√™ncias comportamentais e experi√™ncias vividas, seu potencial e habilidades para aprender e se adaptar. Al√©m disso, √© importante compreender que uma busca profissional n√£o se restringe apenas a buscar uma vaga aberta e se aplicar a ela‚Äù, diz Dal Col. ‚Äú√â importante estudar o mercado de trabalho, tend√™ncias de diferentes setores e segmentos, verificar como sua experi√™ncia, habilidades e potencial podem ser transformados em uma ‚Äòoferta atrativa‚Äô para empresas de seu interesse.‚Äù
Para ela, √© importante tamb√©m, ao participar do processo seletivo, estudar sobre a empresa, estar pronto para n√£o apenas responder perguntas, mas tamb√©m fazer perguntas e demonstrar seu entendimento sobre o momento daquela empresa.
Ana Paula Prado, CEO do Infojobs, destaca a r√°pida transforma√ß√£o no mercado de trabalho global. Apesar do avan√ßo, o Brasil ainda precisa superar desafios culturais, tecnol√≥gicos e legais para se equiparar a cen√°rios mais desenvolvidos. A CEO lista cinco tend√™ncias globais de recrutamento que influenciam as pr√°ticas de atra√ß√£o e contrata√ß√£o de profissionais qualificados.
Diversidade e Inclus√£o: Enquanto pa√≠ses desenvolvidos priorizam a diversidade no ambiente de trabalho, um estudo do Infojobs revela que no Brasil, 50,6% dos profissionais veem a diversidade como um discurso de marketing.
Recrutamento Remoto: A pandemia impulsionou o recrutamento remoto, possibilitando que empresas brasileiras explorem talentos em qualquer parte do mundo, semelhante √† pr√°tica na Uni√£o Europeia.
Compet√™ncias e Realiza√ß√µes em Foco: Nos Estados Unidos, o recrutamento se concentra nas compet√™ncias e realiza√ß√µes dos candidatos, utilizando sistemas de rastreamento de candidatos para filtragem baseada em palavras-chave.
Intelig√™ncia Artificial e Machine Learning: Enquanto os EUA lideram na implementa√ß√£o de IA e Machine Learning no recrutamento, no Brasil essas tecnologias s√£o ainda novidade e mais comuns em grandes empresas.
Leis Menos R√≠gidas: A complexidade das regulamenta√ß√µes trabalhistas no Brasil impacta o processo de recrutamento. Em compara√ß√£o, nos Estados Unidos, leis mais flex√≠veis oferecem maior √™nfase na negocia√ß√£o individual de contratos.
Oportunidades de emprego
A Secretaria Estadual de Trabalho e Renda divulgou em seu √∫ltimo boletim 642 oportunidades de trabalho em todo o Rio de Janeiro. As vagas abrangem diferentes regi√µes e s√£o disponibilizadas atrav√©s do Sistema Nacional de Emprego (Sine) e da parceria com a Funda√ß√£o Mudes, oferecendo est√°gios e oportunidades de jovem aprendiz.
A Regi√£o Metropolitana concentra a maior quantidade de oportunidades, com 498 vagas para diversos n√≠veis de escolaridade, incluindo 75 posi√ß√µes destinadas a pessoas com defici√™ncia (PcD), com remunera√ß√£o de at√© dois sal√°rios m√≠nimos (R$ 2.640). Al√©m disso, h√° oportunidades com exig√™ncia de experi√™ncia para fun√ß√µes como maitre, fiscal de preven√ß√£o de perdas e cozinheiro de restaurante, com sal√°rios chegando a R$ 3.960.
O setor de Servi√ßos lidera as oportunidades, representando 65,4% das vagas, enquanto 34,6% s√£o direcionadas ao setor de Com√©rcio. Em rela√ß√£o √† escolaridade, 55,1% das oportunidades exigem ensino m√©dio completo. Quanto aos sal√°rios, 69,5% das vagas oferecem at√© dois sal√°rios m√≠nimos, sendo que a maioria (81,9%) requer experi√™ncia. Para se inscrever ou atualizar o cadastro, √© necess√°rio comparecer a uma unidade do Sine com os documentos de identifica√ß√£o civil, carteira de trabalho, PIS/PASEP/NIT/NIS e CPF.
De acordo com o governo do Estado, de janeiro a 25 de dezembro os postos Sine no Rio de Janeiro ofereceram 40.843 vagas, sendo encaminhadas 43.382 pessoas para essas vagas. Ao todo, receberam algum tipo de atendimento mais de 320.000 pessoas, entre balc√£o de emprego, seguro-desemprego e carteira de trabalho digital.
"Durante o ano de 2023, t√©cnicos dos postos Sine t√™m realizado um trabalho de conscientiza√ß√£o e encaminhamento da popula√ß√£o fluminense n√£o s√≥ para vagas de trabalho, mas tamb√©m para as oportunidades de capacita√ß√£o oferecidas pelo Governo do Estado. Por meio desse atendimento nos postos Sine, a secretaria, em parceria com a Secretaria de Educa√ß√£o, tem conseguido direcionar candidatos que n√£o possuem o grau de escolaridade exigida (Ensino Fundamental ou M√©dio), bem como para cursos de qualifica√ß√£o setorial oferecidos pela Firjan", disse o Governo.

author: Marie H.
title: "J'ai envoy√© une recette de brownies √† Parcoursup et j'ai √©t√© re√ßue en psychologie"
text:
"J‚Äôai envoy√© une recette de brownies √† Parcoursup et j‚Äôai √©t√© re√ßue en psychologie"mis √† jour le 12 juin 2025 √† 09:49
La plateforme Parcoursup a √©t√© dup√©e par une candidate qui, √† la place de sa lettre de motivation, a envoy√© une recette de brownie‚Ä¶
Lundi 2 juin, Parcoursup a d√©voil√© ses premiers r√©sultats. Tous
les inscrits savent d√©sormais quelles sont les r√©ponses des
formations d√©sir√©es. Liste d‚Äôattente, premier v≈ìu exauc√©,
refus‚Ä¶La plateforme, qui a remplac√© le site APB (Admission
Post-Bac) en 2018, a fait des heureux et laiss√©
d‚Äôautres dans l'attente. Ces derniers avaient jusqu‚Äôau 5 juin
pour d√©cider s‚Äôils acceptaient, refusaient ou pr√©f√©raient attendre
l‚Äôavanc√©e de leur position sur les listes d‚Äôattente. De nouvelles
propositions d‚Äôadmission pourront √™tre faites jusqu‚Äô√† la
mi-juillet.
Les d√©√ßus de Parcoursup sont de retour. Chaque ann√©e, ces lyc√©ens et candidats d√©sorient√©s partagent leurs √©tats d‚Äô√¢me, mais aussi leurs meilleures "blagues" sur les r√©seaux sociaux. Sur X, on tente de d√©dramatiser la situation en faisant de l‚Äôhumour. "J‚Äôai demand√© un BTS Boucherie sur #Parcoursup pour faire rire mes potes et c‚Äôest ma seule demande qui a √©t√© accept√©e", a-t-on notamment pu lire.
Les d√©√ßus de Parcoursup ont beaucoup √† dire
Par ailleurs, certains n‚Äôh√©sitent pas √† remettre en question le s√©rieux avec lequel leurs candidatures sont examin√©es. Persuad√©s que leurs lettres de motivation ne sont m√™me pas lues, ils ont recours √† l‚Äôintelligence artificielle pour les r√©diger, voire testent le syst√®me en envoyant n'importe quoi.
C‚Äôest ainsi que la plateforme d'orientation a √©t√© bern√©e par une
candidate. En lieu et place d‚Äôune lettre de motivation, elle a
envoy√©
une recette de brownie √† plusieurs universit√©s‚Ä¶ et a √©t√©
accept√©e dans deux d'entre elles !
Elle remplace sa lettre de motivation par une recette de brownie sur Parcoursup
Morgane a ainsi √©t√© accept√©e en licence de psychologie et en fac de sport sur Parcoursup avec cette dr√¥le de lettre de motivation. "Avec une copine, quand j‚Äôai fait mes v≈ìux, je me suis dit : pourquoi ne pas essayer la psychologie ? (‚Ä¶) J‚Äôai tap√© une recette de brownie, et je l‚Äôai copi√©e-coll√©e dans ma lettre de motivation", a-t-elle expliqu√© √† France 2. En plus de s‚Äôassurer une place sur les bancs de la fac, elle s‚Äôest offert un √©norme buzz. La vid√©o dans laquelle elle raconte son coup d‚Äô√©clat a enregistr√© un million de vues en quelques jours.
Pour les d√©√ßus de Parcoursup, c‚Äôest bien la preuve du caract√®re al√©atoire et du manque de transparence du syst√®me actuel. "On dit que la lettre de motivation est importante, que √ßa appuie le dossier‚Ä¶ Et au final, ils ne regardent que les notes", a d√©clar√© la jeune fille.
Recadrage par le rectorat
Du c√¥t√© du rectorat de Toulouse (Haute-Garonne), on a moyennement appr√©ci√© la plaisanterie. Morgane a √©t√© convoqu√©e par le proviseur de son lyc√©e pour un s√©rieux recadrage. Le rectorat a n√©anmoins admis que les crit√®res de s√©lection avaient √©t√© respect√©s. En psychologie, "6 % de la d√©cision repose sur la lettre de motivation".
Sur X, quelques utilisateurs ont tenu √† souligner que ce coup de bluff n‚Äôa fonctionn√© que parce que la fili√®re vis√©e est peu s√©lective. "Elle postule dans une fili√®re qui ne filtre pas‚Ä¶ Ensuite, elle s‚Äô√©tonne d‚Äô√™tre prise en ayant racont√© n‚Äôimporte quoi dans sa demande" ou encore "On parle de Psycho comme fac ! Je pense que tout le monde y rentre. Fais √ßa en m√©decine, en droit ou en pr√©pa, et tu es jet√© imm√©diatement", a-t-on pu lire.

author: F_400991
title: Chinese coastal province evacuates 282,000 as Typhoon Kong-rey approaches - People's Daily Online
text: HANGZHOU, Nov. 1 (Xinhua) -- Authorities in east China's Zhejiang Province had evacuated 282,000 people by Friday morning ahead of the Typhoon Kong-rey, which will bring strong winds, heavy rain and heightened flood risks to the region. Over 10,600 emergency shelters have been opened across the province, providing meals and drinking water to those relocated. The large-scale evacuation comes as Kong-rey nears the eastern coast of the Chinese mainland. All 152 passenger ferry routes in Zhejiang, involving 347 vessels, have been suspended, while 136 water-related construction projects have been paused, and 675 construction vessels moved to sheltered areas. Zhejiang's agricultural sector is also taking preventative action to minimize potential losses, such as clearing drainage channels, reinforcing greenhouses and harvesting vegetables and seasonal fruits ahead of the storm. Typhoon Kong-rey made landfall in southeastern Taiwan's Taitung at around 1:40 p.m. Thursday. By 10 a.m. Friday, its center was located in the sea area about 160 kilometers southwest of Wenling, Zhejiang, moving northeast at around 30 kilometers per hour. Kong-rey may either make landfall along Zhejiang's coast or pass closely offshore, according to the Zhejiang meteorological authority. Yan Xiaofan, an official with Zhejiang's emergency management department, said that the typhoon had already brought heavier-than-expected rainfall to the province, regardless of whether it makes a second landfall. Zhejiang has recorded an average of 70.7 millimeters of rainfall over the past 24 hours, with strong gales impacting central and southern coastal areas. Tong Huabin, another official from the department, cautioned that authorities are on high alert for flash floods, landslides and urban flooding. The National Meteorological Center issued a blue alert for Kong-rey on Friday morning, forecasting torrential rains in eastern provincial-level regions, including Zhejiang, Jiangsu and Shanghai, from Friday afternoon through Saturday. Parts of Jiangsu and Shanghai could experience downpours of 100 to 120 millimeters. The Chinese mainland has a four-tier color-coded weather warning system, with red representing the most severe, followed by orange, yellow and blue. Photos Related Stories [Chinese coastal province raises emergency response as Typhoon Kong-rey nears](/n3/2024/1031/c90000-20236192.html)[China activates emergency response as super typhoon nears](/n3/2024/1031/c90000-20235986.html)[China activates emergency response to flooding in Hainan](/n3/2024/1030/c90000-20235608.html)[Some parts of Hainan experience heavy rainfall due to influence of Typhoon Trami](/n3/2024/1029/c90000-20234871.html)[East China girds for approaching Typhoon Kong-rey](/n3/2024/1028/c90000-20234428.html) About People's Daily Online | Join Us | Contact Us Copyright ¬© 2024 People's Daily Online. All Rights Reserved.

author: staff@glam.com (Anna Denson)
title: The Worst-Dressed Celebs At Paris Haute Couture Week Spring/Summer 2025
text:
The Worst-Dressed Celebs At Paris Haute Couture Week Spring/Summer 2025
Maybe we're biased, but it felt like our favorite celebs put on a particularly good show at Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2025. Pamela Anderson continued exploring her recent jaunt into refreshing minimalist fashion, Megan Thee Stallion was a tangerine dream at the Giambattista Valli show and some kind of primal goddess at the Gaurav Gupta show, and we were all in raptures as we took more dark and dangerous steps into Jenna Ortega's stunning style evolution, with the "Wednesday" star's all-black ensemble being drop-dead gorgeous.
The list goes on, and with so many knockout 'fits, a best-dressed list would be almost impossible to nail down. But where there are style successes, there are inevitably a few style failures. With the fashion week bar set so high, a few stars stood out for their lack of imagination or disjointed styling. From Venus Williams' unbalanced attempt at elevated streetwear to Kylie Jenner's snooze-worthy Blair Waldorf cosplay, some celebrity guests simply fell a little short.
Karlie Kloss' skirt suit was sharp but unmemorable
Iconic model and former Victoria's Secret angel Karlie Kloss knows how to work her angles, so it's no surprise that she looked sleek in her tailored suit at the Christian Dior show during Paris Haute Couture Week Spring/Summer 2025. Unfortunately for Kloss, however, other attendees turned the volume up to 11 with reimagined pieces, which left her too-classic look lagging behind. Beyond its impeccable fit, the ensemble offered no standout details, ultimately making Kloss' suit a forgettable addition to this fashion week's parade of styles. Sadly, this isn't the first time the model has disappointed: In 2019, Kloss' underwhelming puff-sleeved minidress landed her among the worst outfits in Met Gala history.
Venus Williams' styling let down her cool jumpsuit
It deeply pains us to include a GOAT like Venus Williams on this list, but something about the silhouette of her fashion-week 'fit just didn't work for the tennis star. Though we loved the subtle, monochromatic combination of streetwear with chic accessories, Williams' slouchy jumpsuit was paired with an equally slouchy jacket, which seemed to shorten the usually leggy athlete. This look might have been saved with a higher hairdo to draw the eye upward, but as it stood, the styling on this day did Williams no justice.
Kylie Jenner's co-ords were more of the same
Attending the Chanel show at Paris Haute Couture Week on January 28, Kylie Jenner wore a white tweed set that could have come straight out of "Gossip Girl." And while tweed had a stealth-wealth moment in fall 2023, it's starting to feel a little tired by now. We get that Jenner was trying to rep Chanel during the show, but she could have created more interest by mixing and matching the pieces instead of wearing the full set. Jenner isn't afraid to push fashion boundaries, so it would have been nice to see something new or fresh for this fashion week. For instance, while it was an overall simpler look, we much preferred the double-lapeled leather jacket her sister Kendall wore to the Schiaparelli show the day prior.
Lily-Rose Depp's take on tweed was both busy and dull
As the child of A-list actor Johnny Depp and model Vanessa Paradis, Lily-Rose Depp comes from a strong fashion background. However, her outfit at Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2025 fell flat. Not to hate on tweed, especially at a Chanel show, but it felt like Lily-Rose fell prey to the same weight of expectation that led Kylie Jenner to pick such an expected outfit. At least Lily-Rose tried to spice things up with black, feathered trim and the addition of beetle brooches on the skirt, but ultimately, the garments looked busy and fought with each other. It didn't help that her mom was wearing an intriguing feather jacket, which effortlessly outshone Lily-Rose's staid separates.
Raffey Cassidy's goth-adjacent outfit had too many ideas
Don't come at us, Dior stans, but we can't get behind "Tomorrowland" actor Raffey Cassidy's look from the fashion house. The silhouette was cute and innovative, the accessorizing was satisfying, and the hidden shorts were a delight. But try as we might, we can't look at the patched and riveted top without feeling transported to Hot Topic circa 2005. This referential, pseudo-goth aesthetic cheapens the vibe of Cassidy's outfit. If only it had been kept simple in solid black without all the unnecessary embellishments.
Jeanne Damas' sleeves spoiled her whole look
As a designer and model herself, we'd have hoped that Jeanne Damas ‚Äî founder of the French fashion label Rouje ‚Äî would have picked a more suitable silhouette. Her look was certainly headed in the right direction with the coat's luxe charcoal palette and the matching, frankly adorable shoes, but we can't get past the dreadful fit on Damas' sleeves. Playing with proportion is one thing, but that amorphous shape and too-short cuff make Damas look broader and shorter than she really is, which is a crime against her natural beauty.
Lourdes Leon's near-nudity was all shock and no awe
Playing it safe was the biggest sartorial sin at Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2025. However, there were also a few big swings that ended up missing the mark ‚Äî such as Lourdes Leon's barely there bodysuit. The singer and model, who happens to be Madonna's daughter, arrived at Saint Laurent's menswear show in sheer, strapless lace under an open black, leather jacket. The ensemble left her black undies and lack of bra totally visible, and while it was certainly a bold move, Leon's look delivered more shock value than √©lan. Madonna's kids may all have their own unique sense of style, but we'd send Leon back to the drawing board after this outing.

text:
Intenso tiroteo entre polic√≠as y supuestos delincuentes en Minga Guaz√∫
Un intenso tiroteo se registr√≥ este jueves entre polic√≠as y delincuentes en Minga Guaz√∫, Departamento de Alto Paran√°. Los desconocidos lograron fugarse y los agentes incautaron un veh√≠culo, vainillas servidas, clavos miguelitos, entre otros indicios.
Un enfrentamiento a tiros entre la
Polic√≠a Nacional y presuntos delincuentes se registr√≥ sobre la ruta PY06, en el lugar denominado kil√≥metro 10.000, en Minga Guaz√∫.
Personal de la Subcomisar√≠a 52¬™ Fracci√≥n Piro‚Äôy y 39 Colonia Tavapy I se encontraban realizando control preventivo de personas y veh√≠culos, en donde iban a proceder a la verificaci√≥n de un autom√≥vil de la marca Toyota, modelo Premio, color gris, a√±o 2002, con chapa que no le correspond√≠a.
En ese momento los ocupantes, que eran cuatro hombres con armas de fuego, al percatarse del control policial, realizaron varios disparos contra los intervinientes, produci√©ndose un enfrentamiento y persecuci√≥n, del que result√≥ con da√±os materiales una patrullera con dos impactos de bala.
Los desconocidos se internaron en una zona boscosa, en el kil√≥metro 18 lado Monday, abandonando el veh√≠culo, inform√≥ √âdgar Medina periodista de √öltima Hora.
Del rodado fue incautado vainillas servidas, clavos miguelitos, documentos varios y una chapa la cual corresponde al autom√≥vil.
El hecho fue comunicado a las autoridades competentes.
